Last Resort
/ Vivacity
1 - 6 Range / 2AP

Applies the Gravity state on enemies in an area of effect around the targeted ally.
If the targeted ally is an Enutrof summons, also inflicts Neutral damage on enemies in an area of effect based on the target's missing health points.
Required level: :
175

100% of attacker's missing HP (Neutral damage)

No effect for this spell

spells.html_content:
Spells

Lucky Shovel
/ Pull Out
2 - 7 Range / 2AP

Summons a static Lucky Shovel.
When summoned, and then at the start of each turn, the Lucky Shovel increases the caster's Power, Dodge, AP Reduction, and MP Reduction.
The effects cannot be unbewitched.

If an enemy destroys it, the caster inflicts damage in their best attack element on the enemy.
The shovel is destroyed 4 turns after being summoned.

When attacked by an ally, the ally is healed.
Required level: :
185

Normal effects

Summons
Kills the target
20 (Best Element damage)

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Uses per turn
1
Modifiable range
Yes
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
No

spells.html_content:
Spells

Firedamp Explosion
/ Unsummoning
1 - 8 Range / 3AP

Inflicts Fire damage on enemies in an area of effect.

For 2 turns, inflicts Fire damage on enemies in a 2-cell circle around the target if it is healed.
Each time it is triggered, the minimum and maximum amplitude of damage increases.

May be triggered 3 times per turn.
Required level: :
195

Normal effects

14 (Fire damage)
14 (Fire damage) (2 turns)
12 to 15 (Fire damage)
8 to 17 (Fire damage)
